at/in the back of your mind.word: at/in the back of your mind
at/in the back of your mind.translation[: a thought that is at the back of your mind is one you try to ignore because you do not want it to be true
At the back of her mind was the thought that he might be with someone else.
He tried to push these uncomfortable thoughts to the back of his mind.
put/push something to the back of your mind
